title: Pixel 3xl - Roaming indicator off - how to fix
content:
Hello, new pixel 3xl from Google running on Us cellular. Phone works fine except I cannot access voicemail. US-Cellular support said the Phone is not reading its EID number off the sim card they needed. I had my sim card replaced and same issue.

Calling and texting works just fine. However under data settings, it lists "roaming indicator off". I have roaming turned on, and have tried enabling and disabling those settings. The tech guy at us cellular said he hadnt seen an issue like this and I should contact Google since it seemed like a software bug.

Also in settings under "Sim Status", it lists Not Roaming and EID unknown. 
 Has anyone ran into this before and is there a fix?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
